thread.section_title: Artfinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Artfinder | artfinder.com
thread.title: Libby

author: Libby
title: Libby
text:
My painting arrived very promptly from Netherland to Australia. I was very excited. It was packed very carefully and thoughtfully. Once opened my painting was exactly as described in every detail and colour from the webpage. I hung the painting immediately and it takes pride of place in my sitting room. The painting was by artist Mo Tuncay. I love every brush stroke on the canvas.
I feel very happy with my experience dealing through Artfinder.
Kind regards
Libby
